member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsEmptyCollection
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Empty collection is not allowed..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsEmptyGuid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Empty Guid is not allowed..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotFalse
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected an expression that evaluates to false..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotGt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is not greater than limit '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotGte
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is not greater than or equal to limit '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotInRange_ToHigh
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is > max '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotInRange_ToLong
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The string is too long. Must be between '{0}' and '{1}'. Must be between '{0}' and '{1}' but was '{2}' characters long..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotInRange_ToLow
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is < min '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotInRange_ToShort
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The string is not long enough. Must be between '{0}' and '{1}' but was '{2}' characters long..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotLt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is not lower than limit '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotLte
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' is not lower than or equal to limit '{1}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value can not be null..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotNullOrEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The string can't be null or empty..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotNullOrWhiteSpace
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The string can't be left empty, null or consist of only whitespaces..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotOfType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The param is not of expected type: '{0}'..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_IsNotTrue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected an expression that evaluates to true..

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.EnsureExtensions_NoMatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to value '{0}' does not match '{1}'.

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.EnsureThat.Resources.ExceptionMessages.ExpressionUtils_GetRightMostMember_NoMemberFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No MemberExpression found in expression: '{0}'..

members.member: A modified version of a string edit distance described by Berghel and Roach that uses only O(d) space and O(n*d) worst-case time, where n is the pattern string length and d is the edit distance computed. We achieve the space reduction by keeping only those sub-computations required to compute edit distance, giving up the ability to reconstruct the edit path.

member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthRequest
member.summary: A request wrapper for the OAuth 1.0a specification.

member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthRequestType
member.summary: The types of OAuth requests possible in a typical workflow. Used for validation purposes and to build static helpers.

member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod
member.summary: The encryption method to use when hashing a request signature.

member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureTreatment
member.summary: Specifies whether the final signature value should be escaped during calculation. This might be necessary for some OAuth implementations that do not obey the default specification for signature escaping.

member.name: T:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools
member.summary: A general purpose toolset for creating components of an OAuth request.

member.name: F:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools._encoding
member.summary: All text parameters are UTF-8 encoded (per section 5.1).

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetNonce
member.summary: Generates a random 16-byte lowercase alphanumeric string.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetTimestamp
member.summary: Generates a timestamp based on the current elapsed seconds since '01/01/1970 0000 GMT"

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetTimestamp(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a timestamp based on the elapsed seconds of a given time since '01/01/1970 0000 GMT"

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.UrlEncodeRelaxed(System.String)
member.summary: URL encodes a string based on section 5.1 of the OAuth spec. Namely, percent encoding with [RFC3986], avoiding unreserved characters, upper-casing hexadecimal characters, and UTF-8 encoding for text value pairs.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.UrlEncodeStrict(System.String)
member.summary: URL encodes a string based on section 5.1 of the OAuth spec. Namely, percent encoding with [RFC3986], avoiding unreserved characters, upper-casing hexadecimal characters, and UTF-8 encoding for text value pairs.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.NormalizeRequestParameters(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.WebParameterCollection)
member.summary: Sorts a collection of key-value pairs by name, and then value if equal, concatenating them into a single string. This string should be encoded prior to, or after normalization is run.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.SortParametersExcludingSignature(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.WebParameterCollection)
member.summary: Sorts a by name, and then value if equal.
member.param: A collection of parameters to sort

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.ConstructRequestUrl(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a request URL suitable for making OAuth requests. Resulting URLs must exclude port 80 or port 443 when accompanied by HTTP and HTTPS, respectively. Resulting URLs must be lower case.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.ConcatenateRequestElements(System.String,System.String,NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.WebParameterCollection)
member.summary: Creates a request elements concatentation value to send with a request. This is also known as the signature base.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret. This method is used when the token secret is currently unknown.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureTreatment,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret. This method is used when the token secret is currently unknown.
member.param: The treatment to use on a signature value

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret and a known token secret.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,NzbDrone.Common.OAuth.OAuthSignatureTreatment,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret and a known token secret.
member.param: The treatment to use on a signature value

member.name: F:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler._currentThreadIsProcessingItems
member.summary: Whether the current thread is processing work items.

member.name: F:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler._tasks
member.summary: The list of tasks to be executed.

member.name: F:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler._maxDegreeOfParallelism
member.summary: The maximum concurrency level allowed by this scheduler.

member.name: F:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler._delegatesQueuedOrRunning
member.summary: Whether the scheduler is currently processing work items.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler class with the specified degree of parallelism.
member.param: The maximum degree of parallelism provided by this scheduler.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.QueueTask(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Queues a task to the scheduler.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.NotifyThreadPoolOfPendingWork
member.summary: Informs the ThreadPool that there's work to be executed for this scheduler.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to execute the specified task on the current thread.
member.returns: Whether the task could be executed on the current thread.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.TryDequeue(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Attempts to remove a previously scheduled task from the scheduler.
member.returns: Whether the task could be found and removed.

member.name: P:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.MaximumConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum concurrency level supported by this scheduler.

member.name: M:NzbDrone.Common.TPL.LimitedConcurrencyLevelTaskScheduler.GetScheduledTasks
member.summary: Gets an enumerable of the tasks currently scheduled on this scheduler.
member.returns: An enumerable of the tasks currently scheduled.
